file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-26-06-07 - CHECK VALVE - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CHECK VALVE - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. The two check valves are installed to the forward electronic-compartment exhaust hoses (between frames 5 and 6). The cleaning procedure is applicable to the two check valves. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 21-26-06-100-801-A CHECK VALVE - CLEANING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-26-06 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-26-06-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CHECK VALVE - CLEANING A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to clean the check valve. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 21-26-06-000-801-A/400 CHECK VALVE - REMOVAL AMM TASK 21-26-06-400-801-A/400 CHECK VALVE - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 21-26-06-600-801-A/300 CHECK VALVE - LUBRICATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113CZ Nose-landing-gear compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Stiff-bristle brush To clean the check valve 1 available F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) Commercially available Mild soap AR Commercially available Cloth AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the check valve ( AMM TASK 21-26-06-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 21-26-06 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Clean the Forward Electronic-Compartment Check Valve (Figure 701) SUBTASK 140-002-A (1) Remove the screws (1), washers (2) and nuts (3) to disassemble the check valve. (2) Brush the valve inlet (4) and outlet (5) ducts and flap-type check valve (6) with a stiff- bristle brush. (3) Wipe inside inlet (4) and outlet (5) ducts and flap-type check valve (6) with a cloth moistened with mild soap. (4) Finish the cleaning with a dry and clean cloth. (5) Lubricate the check valve (AMM TASK 21-26-06-600-801-A/300). (6) Install the screws (1), washers (2) and nuts (3) to assemble the check valve. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the check valve ( AMM TASK 21-26-06-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 21-26-06 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
